name: Invisible Ladders
description: Atop the management minaret an aging Kublai Khan grills the frosh new hire Marco Polo about the ladders he has encountered in Shangdu Heavy Industries. There's only one problem: Marco Polo has been spending all this time playing pinball in the grand arcade!!! Zoops!! Can YOU help Marco Polo bullshit his way out of certain death at the hands of his marauding boss?
